articles.description: James Maddison will not be included in England's 26-man squad for Euro 2024.
articles.title: James Maddison: Midfielder cut from England squad for Euro 2024

articles.description: Uganda captain Brian Masaba revels in his side's first win at a T20 World Cup after they beat Papua New Guinea in Florida.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Uganda celebrate first win at major global event

articles.description: Australia overcome an early wobble to beat Oman comfortably by 39 runs in their opening match at the T20 World Cup in Barbados.
articles.title: T20 World Cup 2024: Australia begin with comfortable win against Oman

articles.description: Chelsea will block any loan moves for Romelu Lukaku this summer as they look to sell the Belgium striker.
articles.title: Romelu Lukaku: Chelsea want to sell Belgium striker for about £37m and will block loan moves

articles.description: England and Saracens lock Rosie Galligan tells BBC Sport about how having breast reduction surgery has helped her rugby career.
articles.title: Rosie Galligan: England international on breast reduction surgery

articles.description: Alexander Zverev reaches the French Open semi-finals for the fourth consecutive year by seeing off the spirited challenge of Alex de Minaur.
articles.title: French Open 2024 results: Alexander Zverev beats Alex de Minaur to reach semi-finals

articles.description: There would be approximately 100 more incorrect refereeing decisions made if clubs vote to scrap video assistant referees, the Premier League claims.
articles.title: VAR: '100 more wrong decisions if VAR scrapped,' claims Premier League

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo is back to spearhead Portugal's bid to become European champions again - in potentially his last major tournament.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Portugal's Euros record breaker and record chaser

articles.description: India’s fearsome pace attack ruthlessly blows away Ireland on a difficult pitch in New York as they start the T20 World Cup with an eight-wicket victory.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: Rohit Sharma leads India to victory over Ireland

articles.description: England second row Rosie Galligan tells BBC Sport how a breast reduction six years ago helped her sporting career.
articles.title: Rosie Galligan: England rugby player explains how breast reduction helped sporting career
